DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy HES 130/0.42 electrolyte infusion comparison HES 130/0.4 sodium chloride infusion .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Male female ( non pregnant ) patient ; 18 70 year Elective noncardiac surgery ( except pancreatic neurological surgery ) estimate operation duration 2 hour longer General anesthesia Voluntary consent Exclusion : Patients ASAclass III IV , Cardiac insufficiency NYHA class III . IV BMI < 18 > 29 Patients daily urine output < 1L Patients hemodialysis Abnormal liver renal function ( i. e. upper limit normal range ) Abnormal coagulation function ( prothrombin time ( PT ) 3 second high normal activate partial thromboplastin time ( APTT ) 10 second high normal ) Hgb < 10g/dl HCT < 30 % Potassium , sodium chloride upper limit normal laboratory History diabetes mellitus Known history mental neurological disorder , epileptic seizure . History hypertension and/or take betareceptor blocker history atrial fibrillation Patients know hypersensitivity contraindication HES excipients
